body:
Hi there :)

This evening we have just released the latest ParaView version.

I have made changes in the ParaView Spack package which adds this new version.

Note that this is a release candidate, but we are bringing many changes with this release and we have told to ourselves: why wait to the the final release?


VB
title: ParaView: add new ParaView-5.9.0-RC2 release
